text: The actor, most famous for playing Hercules, claims the late Italian designer made an unwanted sexual advance while he was working as a model. Actor Kevin Sorbo alleges that he was sexually harassed by the late Italian fashion magnate Gianni Versace when he was working as a model decades ago. Sorbo made the claim on Adam Carolla's podcast Tuesday during a conversation about the multitude of women who have accused producer Harvey Weinstein of sexual harassment and assault. ` ` I've got my sexual harassment story,'' Sorbo told Carolla during the discussion.
